duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement quality, regulatory, and clinical strategies and objectives to ensure commercial success.
Maintain and continuously improve the Quality Management System (QMS) and oversee all QMS activities.
Lead internal and external audit activities, manage deviations, non-conformances, and corrective actions.
Ensure regulatory registrations and clearances, post-market surveillance, and compliance with medical device standards.
Collaborate with staff driving clinical activities, coaching and supporting clinical trials and registries.
Interact with regulatory bodies, manage inspections, and engage with Notified Bodies and Competent Authorities.
Stay current with medical device regulations, own clinical, regulatory, and clinical metrics, and manage the CRQ budget.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Life Science or related field (Engineering, medical, or nursing degree preferred). Master's degree a plus.
